item.title: Yummy Dressing
item.description: This dressing is easy and plentiful. You get about 2 litres of dressing to work with. It keeps really well in the fridge. Definitely cut back this recipe if the quantity is too much. Ingredients 1 cup nutritional yeast 1/3 cup soy sauce 1/3 cup apple cider vinegar 1/3 cup water 2-3 cloves crushed garlic 2 cups of vegetable oil (canola, olive, whatever) Directions Throw everything into a blender except for the vegetable oil.

item.title: Mustard Vinaigrette
item.description: Ingredients 1/2 cup white vinegar 1 tablespoon honey 1 tablespoon prepared Dijon-style mustard 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper 2 teaspoons salt 2 teaspoons minced garlic 1 cup vegetable oil 4 drops hot sauce Directions In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, honey, mustard, pepper, salt, garlic, oil and hot sauce until thoroughly combined. Chill until serving.
